title: Gifuu Doudou!!: Kanetsugu to Keiji
original_name: 義風堂々!! 兼続と慶次
sinopse: The Sengoku era gave birth to many historical legends. One of them is Naoe Kanetsugu, the brilliant military general of the Uesugi family. Together with Maeda Keiji, a legendary warrior on the battlefield, who become lifelong friends with each other, they carve out a piece of history in the most dangerous and volatile time in Japan's history. The two men recall their beginnings and the journey they took to get to the accomplished position they now sit at.

links.link: http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/義風堂々_直江兼続_-前田慶次月語り-
